dict.string: You can share photos from your local Photo Library with other team members in your group chat.
Your Microphone is needed to join Voice IP meeting.
You can share your location with other team members in your group chat.
You can share your location with other team members in your group chat.
You can use your camera to take photos and videos, and share them with other team members in your group chat.
Your Meeting schedule will be saved to your Calendar.
You can do Airdrop sharing, access Bluetooth headset, keyboard...etc.
